00042 #define CHP_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER 65
00043 
00045 #define CHP_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER 2
00046 
00048 #define EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS 2
00049 
00051 #define EXPRESSION_COMPARISON_STAT_ANALYSIS 3
00052 
00054 #define ROUNDFLOAT 1000

00057 
00058 void CCHPFileHeader::ParseString
00059 (
00060         TagValuePairTypeList &tagList,
00061         std::string sSource, 
00062         std::string sDelimiter1, 
00063         std::string sDelimiter2
00064 )
00065 {
00066         std::string buf;
00067         TagValuePairType param;
00068         std::list<std::string> delList;
00069         std::list<std::string> delList2;
00070 
00071         // Skip delimiters at beginning and find first "non-delimiter" (1st delimiter)
00072         std::string::size_type lastPos1 = sSource.find_first_not_of(sDelimiter1, 0);
00073         std::string::size_type pos1     = sSource.find_first_of(sDelimiter1, lastPos1);
00074 
00075         // Loop to get tokens
00076     while (std::string::npos != pos1 || std::string::npos != lastPos1)
00077         {               
00078                 // Get and store all parsed tokens
00079                 buf = sSource.substr(lastPos1, pos1 - lastPos1);
00080                 delList.push_back(buf);
00081 
00082                 // Skip delimiters and find next "non-delimiter" (1st delimiter)
00083                 lastPos1 = sSource.find_first_not_of(sDelimiter1, pos1);
00084                 pos1 = sSource.find_first_of(sDelimiter1, lastPos1);
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Reverse through stored tokens
00088         std::string sTemp;
00089         std::list<std::string>::reverse_iterator rev(delList.end());
00090         std::list<std::string>::reverse_iterator rev_end(delList.begin());
00091         for (; rev != rev_end; ++rev)
00092         {
00093                 buf = (*rev);
00094 
00095                 // Make sure "buf" has 2nd delimiter, otherwise add to previous "buf"
00096                 std::string::size_type posTemp = buf.find_first_of(sDelimiter2, 0);
00097                 if (std::string::npos == posTemp)
00098                 {
00099                         // Need to add the 1st delimiter back in the front of the "buf"
00100                         // Don't know how many delimiters to add, so let's just add one
00101                         buf = sDelimiter1 + buf;
00102                         sTemp = buf + sTemp;
00103                 }
00104                 else
00105                 {
00106                         // Finally store the valid "name=value" token
00107                         buf += sTemp;
00108                         delList2.push_back(buf);
00109                         sTemp = "";
00110                 }
00111         }
00112 
00113         // Now lets finally iterate over tokens to parse the "name" and "value"
00114         std::list<std::string>::iterator iter;
00115         for (iter=delList2.begin(); iter!=delList2.end(); ++iter)
00116         {
00117                 buf = (*iter);
00118 
00119                 // Skip delimiters at beginning and find first "non-delimiter" (2nd delimiter)
00120                 std::string::size_type lastPos2 = buf.find_first_not_of(sDelimiter2, 0);
00121                 std::string::size_type pos2     = buf.find_first_of(sDelimiter2, lastPos2);
00122                 
00123                 // Validate before assigning "Tag"
00124                 if (std::string::npos != pos2 || std::string::npos != lastPos2)
00125                 {
00126                         param.Tag = buf.substr(lastPos2, pos2 - lastPos2);
00127                         param.Value = "";
00128 
00129                         // Skip delimiters and find next "non-delimiter" (2nd delimiter)
00130                         lastPos2 = buf.find_first_not_of(sDelimiter2, pos2);
00131                         pos2 = buf.find_first_of(sDelimiter2, lastPos2);
00132 
00133                         // Validate before assigning "Value"
00134                         if (std::string::npos != pos2 || std::string::npos != lastPos2)
00135                                 param.Value = buf.substr(lastPos2, pos2 - lastPos2);
00136 
00137                         // Add to tag list
00138                         tagList.push_back(param);
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 }

00144 
00145 std::string CCHPFileHeader::GetAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag)
00146 {
00147         std::string value;
00148         TagValuePairTypeList::iterator iter;
00149         for (iter=m_AlgorithmParameters.begin(); iter!=m_AlgorithmParameters.end(); ++iter)
00150         {
00151                 if (*iter == tag)
00152                 {
00153                         value = iter->Value;
00154                         break;
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         return value;
00158 }
00159 
00161 
00162 std::string CCHPFileHeader::GetSummaryParameter(const char *tag)
00163 {
00164         std::string value;
00165         TagValuePairTypeList::iterator iter;
00166         for (iter=m_SummaryParameters.begin(); iter!=m_SummaryParameters.end(); ++iter)
00167         {
00168                 if (*iter == tag)
00169                 {
00170                         value = iter->Value;
00171                         break;
00172                 }
00173         }
00174         return value;
00175 }
00176 
00178 
00179 BackgroundZoneType CCHPFileHeader::GetBackgroundZone(int x, int y)
00180 {
00181         BackgroundZoneType zone;
00182         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator iter;
00183         for (iter=m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones.begin(); iter!=m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones.end(); ++iter)
00184         {
00185                 if (iter->centerx == x && iter->centery == y)
00186                 {
00187                         zone = (*iter);
00188                         break;
00189                 }
00190         }
00191         return zone;
00192 }

00202 
00203 void CCHPFileHeader::Clear()
00204 {
00205         m_Magic=0;
00206         m_Version=0;
00207         m_Cols=0;
00208         m_Rows=0;
00209         m_NumProbeSets=0;
00210         m_AssayType=Unknown;
00211         m_ChipType = "";
00212         m_AlgorithmName = "";
00213         m_AlgorithmVersion = "";
00214         m_ParentCellFile = "";
00215         m_ProgID = "";
00216         m_AlgorithmParameters.erase(m_AlgorithmParameters.begin(), m_AlgorithmParameters.end());
00217         m_SummaryParameters.erase(m_SummaryParameters.begin(), m_SummaryParameters.end());
00218         m_BackgroundZoneInfo.number_zones = 0;
00219         m_BackgroundZoneInfo.smooth_factor = 0.0f;
00220         m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones.erase(m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones.begin(), m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones.end());
00221 }

00245 
00246 void CCHPFileData::Clear()
00247 {
00248         m_Header.Clear();
00249         m_FileName = "";
00250         m_strError = "";
00251         int n = (int) m_ProbeSetResults.size();
00252         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00253         {
00254                 delete m_ProbeSetResults[i];
00255                 m_ProbeSetResults[i]=NULL;
00256         }
00257         m_ProbeSetResults.erase(m_ProbeSetResults.begin(), m_ProbeSetResults.end());
00258 }

00262 CExpressionProbeSetResults *CCHPFileData::GetExpressionResults(int index)
00263 {
00264         if (index < m_Header.GetNumProbeSets() && m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00265         {
00266                 return (CExpressionProbeSetResults *) m_ProbeSetResults[index];
00267         }
00268         return NULL;
00269 }

00310 std::string CGenotypeProbeSetResults::GetAlleleCallString()
00311 {
00312         switch (AlleleCall)
00313         {
00314         case ALLELE_A_CALL:
00315                 return "A";
00316                 break;
00317 
00318         case ALLELE_B_CALL:
00319                 return "B";
00320                 break;
00321 
00322         case ALLELE_AB_CALL:
00323                 return "AB";break;
00324 
00325         default:
00326                 return "No Call";
00327                 break;
00328         }
00329         return "";
00330 }

00334 CGenotypeProbeSetResults CGenotypeProbeSetResults::operator = (CGenotypeProbeSetResults &src)
00335 {
00336         AlleleCall = src.AlleleCall;
00337         Confidence = src.Confidence;
00338         RAS1 = src.RAS1;
00339         RAS2 = src.RAS2;
00340         pvalue_AA = src.pvalue_AA;
00341         pvalue_AB = src.pvalue_AB;
00342         pvalue_BB = src.pvalue_BB;
00343         pvalue_NoCall = src.pvalue_NoCall;
00344 
00345         return *this;
00346 }

00350 std::string CExpressionProbeSetResults::GetDetectionString()
00351 {
00352         switch (Detection)
00353         {
00354         case ABS_PRESENT_CALL:
00355                 return "P";
00356                 break;
00357 
00358         case ABS_MARGINAL_CALL:
00359                 return "M";
00360                 break;
00361 
00362         case ABS_ABSENT_CALL:
00363                 return "A";
00364                 break;
00365 
00366         case ABS_NO_CALL:
00367                 return "No Call";
00368                 break;
00369 
00370         default:
00371                 break;
00372         }
00373         return "";
00374 }

00377 
00378 std::string CExpressionProbeSetResults::GetChangeString()
00379 {
00380         switch (Change)
00381         {
00382         case COMP_INCREASE_CALL:
00383                 return "I";
00384                 break;
00385 
00386         case COMP_DECREASE_CALL:
00387                 return "D";
00388                 break;
00389 
00390         case COMP_MOD_INCREASE_CALL:
00391                 return "MI";
00392                 break;
00393 
00394         case COMP_MOD_DECREASE_CALL:
00395                 return "MD";
00396                 break;
00397 
00398         case COMP_NO_CHANGE_CALL:
00399                 return "NC";
00400                 break;
00401 
00402         case COMP_NO_CALL:
00403                 return "No Call";
00404                 break;
00405 
00406         default:
00407                 break;
00408         }
00409 
00410         return "";
00411 }

00415 CExpressionProbeSetResults CExpressionProbeSetResults::operator = (CExpressionProbeSetResults &src)
00416 {
00417         DetectionPValue = src.DetectionPValue;
00418         Signal = src.Signal; 
00419         NumPairs = src.NumPairs;
00420         NumUsedPairs = src.NumUsedPairs;
00421         Detection = src.Detection;
00422         m_HasCompResults = src.m_HasCompResults;
00423         ChangePValue = src.ChangePValue; 
00424         SignalLogRatio = src.SignalLogRatio; 
00425         SignalLogRatioLow = src.SignalLogRatioLow; 
00426         SignalLogRatioHigh = src.SignalLogRatioHigh; 
00427         NumCommonPairs = src.NumCommonPairs;
00428         Change = src.Change;
00429 
00430         return *this;
00431 }

00434 
00435 bool CCHPFileData::Read()
00436 {
00437         // Open the file
00438         if (Open() == false)
00439         {
00440                 Clear();
00441                 return false;
00442         }
00443         return true;
00444 }
00445 
00447 
00448 bool CCHPFileData::ReadHeader()
00449 {
00450         // Read the header, close if failed.
00451         if (Open(true) == false)
00452         {
00453                 Clear();
00454                 return false;
00455         }
00456         return true;
00457 }

00460 
00461 bool CCHPFileData::Exists()
00462 {
00463         // Find the file stats.
00464         struct stat st;
00465         return (stat(m_FileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00466 }
00467 
00469 
00470 bool CCHPFileData::Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00471 {
00472         bool retVal = false;
00473 
00474         // Open the file.
00475         std::ifstream instr;
00476         bool bXDA = false;
00477         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
00478                 bXDA = true;
00479         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00480 
00481         // Check if open
00482         if (!instr)
00483         {
00484                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00485                 return false;
00486         }
00487 
00488 
00489         // Read the header
00490         if (bXDA)
00491         {
00492                 int32_t magic;
00493                 int32_t version;
00494                 int32_t ival;
00495                 uint16_t usval;
00496                 char *sval=NULL;
00497                 float fval;
00498                 uint8_t ucval;
00499 
00500 
00501                 // Read the magic number.
00502                 ReadInt32_I(instr, magic);
00503                 m_Header.m_Magic = magic;
00504 
00505                 // Check if new type.
00506                 if (magic != CHP_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER)
00507                 {
00508                         m_strError = "The file does not appear to be the correct format.";
00509                         return false;
00510                 }
00511 
00512                 // Read the version
00513                 ReadInt32_I(instr, version);
00514                 m_Header.m_Version = version;
00515 
00516                 // Check for version 1 or 2
00517                 if (version > CHP_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER)
00518                 {
00519                         m_strError = "Unable to read this version of the CHP file.";
00520                         return false;
00521                 }
00522 
00523                 // Get the dimensions of the array
00524                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
00525                 m_Header.m_Cols=usval;
00526                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
00527                 m_Header.m_Rows=usval;
00528 
00529                 // Number of probe sets.
00530                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00531                 m_Header.m_NumProbeSets = ival;
00532                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // no qc data extracted.
00533 
00534                 // Assay type
00535                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00536                 m_Header.m_AssayType = (CCHPFileHeader::GeneChipAssayType)ival;
00537 
00538                 // Prog ID.
00539                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00540                 m_Header.m_ProgID = sval;
00541                 delete[] sval;
00542 
00543                 // Parent cell file.
00544                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00545                 m_Header.m_ParentCellFile = sval;
00546                 delete[] sval;
00547 
00548                 // Chip type
00549                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00550                 m_Header.m_ChipType = sval;
00551                 delete[] sval;
00552 
00553                 // Algorithm
00554                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00555                 m_Header.m_AlgorithmName = sval;
00556                 delete[] sval;
00557 
00558                 // Algorithm version
00559                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00560                 m_Header.m_AlgorithmVersion = sval;
00561                 delete[] sval;
00562 
00563                 // Algorithm parameters.
00564                 int32_t nParams=0;
00565                 int32_t iParam;
00566                 ReadInt32_I(instr, nParams);
00567                 TagValuePairType param;
00568                 for (iParam=0; iParam<nParams; iParam++)
00569                 {
00570                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00571                         param.Tag = sval;
00572                         delete[] sval;
00573 
00574                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00575                         param.Value = sval;
00576                         delete[] sval;
00577 
00578                         m_Header.m_AlgorithmParameters.push_back(param);
00579                 }
00580 
00581                 // Summary parameters
00582                 ReadInt32_I(instr, nParams);
00583                 for (iParam=0; iParam<nParams; iParam++)
00584                 {
00585                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00586                         param.Tag = sval;
00587                         delete[] sval;
00588 
00589                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00590                         param.Value = sval;
00591                         delete[] sval;
00592 
00593                         m_Header.m_SummaryParameters.push_back(param);
00594                 }
00595 
00596 
00597                 // Background info              
00598                 ReadInt32_I(instr, nParams);
00599                 m_Header.m_BackgroundZoneInfo.number_zones = nParams;
00600                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00601                 m_Header.m_BackgroundZoneInfo.smooth_factor = fval;
00602 
00603                 // Background zones
00604                 BackgroundZoneType zone;
00605                 for (iParam=0; iParam<nParams; iParam++)
00606                 {
00607                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00608                         zone.centerx = fval;
00609                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00610                         zone.centery = fval;
00611                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00612                         zone.background = fval;
00613 
00614                         m_Header.m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones.push_back(zone);
00615                 }
00616 
00617                 // Return if only reading the header.
00618                 if (bReadHeaderOnly == true)
00619                         return true;
00620 
00621 
00622                 // Only continue if genotyping or expression
00623                 if (m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Expression &&
00624                         m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping &&
00625                         m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Universal &&
00626                         m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00627                 {
00628                         m_strError = "The software only supports reading expression, genotyping, tag or resequencing CHP files.";
00629                         return false;
00630                 }
00631 
00632                 // Read the probe set data
00633                 if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00634                 {
00635                         m_ProbeSetResults.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00636                         // Get the type of analysis
00637                         ReadUInt8(instr, ucval); // EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS or EXPRESSION_COMPARISON_STAT_ANALYSIS
00638                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00639 
00640                         int analysisType=ucval;
00641                         if (analysisType != EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS && analysisType != EXPRESSION_COMPARISON_STAT_ANALYSIS)
00642                         {
00643                                 m_strError = "The software only supports reading MAS 5 and above expression CHP files.";
00644                                 return false;
00645                         }
00646 
00647                         // Read each probe set result.
00648                         for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; iset++)
00649                         {
00650                                 CExpressionProbeSetResults * pResults = new CExpressionProbeSetResults;
00651                                 m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
00652 
00653                                 // Read the absolute data.
00654                                 ReadUInt8(instr, ucval);
00655                                 pResults->Detection = ucval;
00656 
00657                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00658                                 pResults->DetectionPValue = fval;
00659                                 
00660                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00661                                 pResults->Signal = fval;
00662                                 
00663                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
00664                                 pResults->NumPairs = usval;
00665                                 
00666                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
00667                                 pResults->NumUsedPairs = usval;
00668 
00669                                 pResults->m_HasCompResults = false;
00670 
00671 
00672                                 // Read the comparison data
00673                                 if (analysisType == EXPRESSION_COMPARISON_STAT_ANALYSIS)
00674                                 {
00675                                         pResults->m_HasCompResults = true;
00676 
00677                                         ReadUInt8(instr, ucval);
00678                                         pResults->Change = ucval;
00679 
00680                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00681                                         pResults->ChangePValue = fval;
00682 
00683                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00684                                         pResults->SignalLogRatio = fval;
00685 
00686                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00687                                         pResults->SignalLogRatioLow = fval;
00688 
00689                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00690                                         pResults->SignalLogRatioHigh = fval;
00691 
00692                                         ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
00693                                         pResults->NumCommonPairs = usval;
00694                                 }
00695                         }
00696                 }
00697                 else if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00698                 {
00699                         m_ProbeSetResults.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00700                         const int DM_ALG_RESULT_SIZE = 21;
00701                         int32_t dataSize=0;
00702                         ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
00703                         for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; iset++)
00704                         {
00705                                 CGenotypeProbeSetResults * pResults = new CGenotypeProbeSetResults;
00706                                 m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
00707 
00708                                 // Read probe set result.
00709                                 ReadUInt8(instr, ucval);
00710                                 pResults->AlleleCall = ucval;
00711 
00712                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00713                                 pResults->Confidence = fval;
00714 
00715                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00716                                 pResults->RAS1 = fval;
00717                                 pResults->pvalue_AA = fval;
00718 
00719                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00720                                 pResults->RAS2 = fval;
00721                                 pResults->pvalue_AB = fval;
00722 
00723                                 if (dataSize == DM_ALG_RESULT_SIZE)
00724                                 {
00725                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00726                                         pResults->pvalue_BB = fval;
00727 
00728                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00729                                         pResults->pvalue_NoCall = fval;
00730                                 }
00731                         }
00732                 }
00733                 else if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
00734                 {
00735                         m_ProbeSetResults.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00736                         int32_t dataSize=0;
00737                         float bg;
00738                         ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
00739                         for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; iset++)
00740                         {
00741                                 CUniversalProbeSetResults * pResults = new CUniversalProbeSetResults;
00742                                 m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
00743 
00744                                 // Read probe set result.
00745                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, bg);
00746                                 pResults->SetBackground(bg);
00747                         }
00748                 }
00749 
00750                 else if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00751                 {
00752                         int32_t dataSize=0;
00753                         int8_t call;
00754                         int32_t pos;
00755                         uint8_t reason;
00756                         float  score;
00757                         int index;
00758 
00759                         // Read the data size
00760                         ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
00761 
00762                         // Read the base calls and scores.
00763                         m_ReseqResults.Clear();
00764                         ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
00765                         m_ReseqResults.ResizeCalledBases(dataSize);
00766                         m_ReseqResults.ResizeScores(dataSize);
00767                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00768                         {
00769                                 ReadInt8(instr, call);
00770                                 m_ReseqResults.SetCalledBase(index, (char)call);
00771                         }
00772                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00773                         {
00774                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, score);
00775                                 m_ReseqResults.SetScore(index, score);
00776                         }
00777 
00778                         // Read the force and original calls.
00779                         if (m_Header.m_Version >= 2)
00780                         {
00781                                 // Read the force calls
00782                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
00783                                 m_ReseqResults.ResizeForceCalls(dataSize);
00784                                 ForceCallType forceCall;
00785                                 for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00786                                 {
00787                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, pos);
00788                                         forceCall.position = pos;
00789                                         ReadInt8(instr, call);
00790                                         forceCall.call = call;
00791                                         ReadUInt8(instr, reason);
00792                                         forceCall.reason = reason;
00793                                         m_ReseqResults.SetForceCall(index, forceCall);
00794                                 }
00795 
00796                                 // Read the orig calls
00797                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
00798                                 m_ReseqResults.ResizeOrigCalls(dataSize);
00799                                 BaseCallType baseCall;
00800                                 for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00801                                 {
00802                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, pos);
00803                                         baseCall.position = pos;
00804                                         ReadInt8(instr, call);
00805                                         baseCall.call = call;
00806                                         m_ReseqResults.SetOrigCall(index, baseCall);
00807                                 }
00808                         }
00809                 }
00810 
00811                 retVal = true;
00812         }
00813         else
00814         {
00815                 // Read the string that defines the CHP file (older format).
00816                 char vString[256]="";
00817                 char AppName[256]="GeneChip Sequence File";
00818                 ReadFixedCString(instr, vString, (int) strlen(AppName));
00819                 if (strcmp(vString, AppName))
00820                 {
00821                         m_strError = "The file does not appear to be the correct format.";
00822                         return false;
00823                 }
00824 
00825                 // Read the version number
00826                 int8_t cval;
00827                 uint8_t ucval;
00828                 uint16_t usval;
00829                 int32_t ival;
00830                 float fval;
00831                 char *sval;
00832                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00833                 m_Header.m_Version = ival;
00834 
00835                 // Read algorithm type string.
00836                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00837                 m_Header.m_AlgorithmName=sval;
00838                 delete[] sval;
00839 
00840                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00841                 m_Header.m_AlgorithmVersion=sval;
00842                 delete[] sval;
00843 
00844                 // Read parameters.
00845                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00846                 std::string sSource = sval;
00847                 m_Header.ParseString(m_Header.m_AlgorithmParameters, sSource, " ", "=");
00848                 delete[] sval;
00849 
00850                 // Read summary
00851                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00852                 std::string sSummary = sval;
00853                 m_Header.ParseString(m_Header.m_SummaryParameters, sSummary, " ", "=");
00854                 delete[] sval;
00855 
00856                 // rows
00857                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00858                 m_Header.m_Rows = ival;
00859 
00860                 // cols
00861                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00862                 m_Header.m_Cols = ival;
00863 
00864                 // #probe sets
00865                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00866                 m_Header.m_NumProbeSets = ival;
00867 
00868                 // the maximum probe set number in the array
00869                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00870                 int maxvalue = ival;
00871 
00872                 // #qc probe sets
00873                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00874 
00875                 // probe set numbers
00876                 int j;
00877                 for (j=0; j<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; j++)
00878                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00879 
00880                 // #probe pairs in each probe set.
00881                 for (j=0; j<maxvalue; j++)
00882                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00883                 
00884                 // type of probe set
00885                 for (j=0; j<maxvalue; j++)
00886                 {
00887                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00888                         if (j == 0)
00889                         {
00890                                 switch (ival)
00891                                 {
00892                                 case 1:
00893                                         m_Header.m_AssayType = CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing;
00894                                         break;
00895 
00896                                 case 2:
00897                                         m_Header.m_AssayType = CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping;
00898                                         break;
00899 
00900                                 case 3:
00901                                         m_Header.m_AssayType = CCHPFileHeader::Expression;
00902                                         break;
00903 
00904                                 case 7:
00905                                         m_Header.m_AssayType = CCHPFileHeader::Universal;
00906                                         break;
00907 
00908                                 default:
00909                                         m_Header.m_AssayType = CCHPFileHeader::Unknown;
00910                                         break;
00911                                 }
00912                         }
00913                 }
00914 
00915                 // This must be a resequencing design if there are no probe sets.
00916                 if (m_Header.m_NumProbeSets == 0)
00917                         m_Header.m_AssayType = CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing;
00918 
00919                 // Check for valid versions.
00920                 if ((m_Header.m_Version < 12 && (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Expression || m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping )) ||
00921                         (m_Header.m_Version < 10 && m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Universal))
00922                 {
00923                         m_strError = "This version of the CHP file is not supported by the parser.";
00924                         return false;
00925                 }
00926 
00927 
00928                 // # probe probes per element (probe pair, probe quartet, etc).
00929                 short *tagCells=NULL;
00930                 if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Universal && bReadHeaderOnly == false)
00931                         tagCells = new short[m_Header.m_NumProbeSets];
00932                 for (j=0; j<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; j++)
00933                 {
00934                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00935                         if (tagCells)
00936                                 tagCells[j] = (short)ival;
00937                 }
00938 
00939                 // Get the chip type
00940                 char ctype[256];
00941                 ReadFixedCString(instr, ctype, 256);
00942                 m_Header.m_ChipType = ctype;
00943 
00944                 // The parent CEL file.
00945                 ReadFixedCString(instr, ctype, 256);
00946                 m_Header.m_ParentCellFile = ctype;
00947 
00948                 // The prog ID.
00949                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00950                 m_Header.m_ProgID = sval;
00951                 delete [] sval;
00952 
00953 
00954                 // Return if only reading the header.
00955                 if (bReadHeaderOnly == true)
00956                         return true;
00957 
00958 
00959                 // Only continue if genotyping or expression
00960                 if (m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Expression &&
00961                         m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping &&
00962                         m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Universal &&
00963                         m_Header.m_AssayType != CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00964                 {
00965                         m_strError = "The software only supports reading expression, genotyping, tag or resequencing CHP files.";
00966                         return false;
00967                 }
00968 
00969                 // Read the probe set data
00970                 if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00971                 {
00972                         // Read each probe set result.
00973                         m_ProbeSetResults.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00974                         for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; iset++)
00975                         {
00976                                 CExpressionProbeSetResults * pResults = new CExpressionProbeSetResults;
00977                                 m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
00978 
00979                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00980                                 pResults->NumPairs = ival;
00981 
00982                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00983                                 pResults->NumUsedPairs = ival;
00984 
00985                                 if (m_Header.m_Version <= 12) // unused
00986                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
00987 
00988                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
00989                                 if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
00990                                 {
00991                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
00992                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
00993                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
00994                                 }
00995 
00996                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
00997                                 pResults->DetectionPValue = fval;
00998 
00999                                 if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01000                                 {
01001                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval); // unused
01002                                 }
01003 
01004                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01005                                 pResults->Signal = fval;
01006 
01007                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01008                                 pResults->Detection = ival;
01009 
01010                                 // unused
01011                                 int ip;
01012                                 for (ip=0; ip<pResults->NumPairs; ++ip)
01013                                 {
01014                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01015                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01016                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01017                                         {
01018                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01019                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01020                                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01021                                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01022                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01023                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01024                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01025                                         }
01026                                         else
01027                                         {
01028                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01029                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01030                                         }
01031                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01032                                         {
01033                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01034                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01035                                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01036                                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01037                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01038                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01039                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01040                                         }
01041                                         else
01042                                         {
01043                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01044                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01045                                         }
01046                                 }
01047 
01048                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01049                                 pResults->m_HasCompResults = (ival == 1 ? true : false);
01050 
01051                                 if (pResults->m_HasCompResults == true)
01052                                 {
01053                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01054                                         pResults->NumCommonPairs = ival;
01055 
01056                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01057                                         {
01058                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01059                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01060                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01061                                         }
01062 
01063                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01064                                         pResults->Change = ival;
01065 
01066                                         ReadInt8(instr, cval); // unused
01067                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01068                                         {
01069                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval); // unused
01070                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01071                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01072                                         }
01073 
01074                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01075                                         pResults->SignalLogRatioHigh = (float) ival / ROUNDFLOAT;
01076 
01077                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01078 
01079                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01080                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01081 
01082                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01083                                         pResults->SignalLogRatio = (float) ival / ROUNDFLOAT;
01084 
01085                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01086                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival); // unused
01087 
01088                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01089                                         pResults->SignalLogRatioLow = (float) ival / ROUNDFLOAT;
01090 
01091                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01092                                         {
01093                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01094                                                 pResults->ChangePValue = (float) ival / ROUNDFLOAT;
01095                                         }
01096                                         else
01097                                         {
01098                                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01099                                                 pResults->ChangePValue = fval;
01100                                         }
01101                                 }
01102                         }
01103                 }
01104                 else if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
01105                 {
01106                         m_ProbeSetResults.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
01107                         for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; iset++)
01108                         {
01109                                 CGenotypeProbeSetResults * pResults = new CGenotypeProbeSetResults;
01110                                 m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
01111 
01112                                 // Unused data
01113                                 int ngroups=0;
01114                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01115                                 ngroups = ival;
01116                                 int ig;
01117                                 for (ig=0; ig<ngroups; ig++)
01118                                 {
01119                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01120                                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01121                                         delete[] sval;
01122                                         ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01123                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01124                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01125                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01126                                 }
01127                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01128                                 if (cval == 1)
01129                                 {
01130                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01131                                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01132                                         delete[] sval;
01133                                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01134                                         delete[] sval;
01135                                         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01136                                         delete[] sval;
01137                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01138                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01139 
01140                                         // The call
01141                                         ReadUInt8(instr, ucval);
01142                                         pResults->AlleleCall = ucval;
01143 
01144                                         // The confidence
01145                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01146                                         {
01147                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01148                                                 pResults->Confidence = (float) ival / ROUNDFLOAT;
01149                                         }
01150                                         else
01151                                         {
01152                                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01153                                                 pResults->Confidence = fval;
01154                                         }
01155 
01156                                         // unused
01157                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01158                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01159                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01160 
01161                                         // RAS 1 and 2
01162                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01163                                         pResults->RAS1 = fval;
01164                                         ReadFloat_I(instr, fval);
01165                                         pResults->RAS2 = fval;
01166                                 }
01167                                 else
01168                                 {
01169                                         pResults->Confidence = 0.0f;
01170                                         pResults->RAS1 = 0.0f;
01171                                         pResults->RAS2 = 0.0f;
01172                                         pResults->AlleleCall = ALLELE_NO_CALL;
01173                                 }
01174 
01175 
01176                                 // 100K results are not stored in this version.
01177                                 pResults->pvalue_AA = 0.0f;
01178                                 pResults->pvalue_AB = 0.0f;
01179                                 pResults->pvalue_BB = 0.0f;
01180                                 pResults->pvalue_NoCall = 0.0f;
01181 
01182                                 // unused
01183                                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01184                                 delete[] sval;
01185                                 ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01186                                 delete[] sval;
01187                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01188                                 int np = ival;
01189                                 int ip;
01190                                 for (ip=0; ip<np; ++ip)
01191                                 {
01192                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01193                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01194                                         {
01195                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01196                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01197                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01198                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01199                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01200                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01201                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01202                                         }
01203                                         else
01204                                         {
01205                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01206                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01207                                         }
01208                                         if (m_Header.m_Version == 12)
01209                                         {
01210                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01211                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01212                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01213                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01214                                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01215                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01216                                                 ReadInt8(instr, cval);
01217                                         }
01218                                         else
01219                                         {
01220                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01221                                                 ReadUInt16_I(instr, usval);
01222                                         }
01223                                 }
01224                         }
01225                 }
01226                 else if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
01227                 {
01228                         m_ProbeSetResults.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
01229                         int32_t unused_32;
01230                         uint16_t unused_u16;
01231                         int8_t unused_8;
01232                         int32_t natoms;
01233                         int32_t ibg;
01234                         float bg;
01235 
01236                         // Read each probe set result.
01237                         for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.m_NumProbeSets; iset++)
01238                         {
01239                                 CUniversalProbeSetResults * pResults = new CUniversalProbeSetResults;
01240                                 m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
01241 
01242                                 // unused (wildtype) length(int), string(len)
01243                                 int ibase;
01244                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32);
01245                                 for (ibase=0; ibase<unused_32; ibase++)
01246                                 {
01247                                         ReadInt8(instr, unused_8);
01248                                 }
01249                                 // unused (called) length(int), string(len)
01250                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32);
01251                                 for (ibase=0; ibase<unused_32; ibase++)
01252                                 {
01253                                         ReadInt8(instr, unused_8);
01254                                 }
01255 
01256                                 // unused (#atoms(int))
01257                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, natoms);
01258                                 for (int iatom=0; iatom<natoms; iatom++)
01259                                 {
01260                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, ibg);
01261                                         if (iatom == 0)
01262                                         {
01263                                                 bg = (float) ibg / ROUNDFLOAT;
01264                                                 pResults->SetBackground(bg);
01265                                         }
01266 
01267                                         // Ignore the probe level data.
01268                                         for (int icell=0; icell<tagCells[iset]; icell++)
01269                                         {
01270                                                 if (m_Header.m_Version <= 12)
01271                                                 {
01272                                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32); // unused X coordinate
01273                                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32); // unused Y coordinate
01274                                                 }
01275                                                 else
01276                                                 {
01277                                                         ReadUInt16_I(instr, unused_u16); // unused X coordinate
01278                                                         ReadUInt16_I(instr, unused_u16); // unused Y coordinate
01279                                                 }
01280                                                 if (m_Header.m_Version <= 12)
01281                                                 {
01282                                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32); // unused intensity
01283                                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32); // unused stdv
01284                                                         ReadInt32_I(instr, unused_32); // unused pixel count
01285                                                         if (m_Header.m_Version >= 8)
01286                                                         {
01287                                                                 ReadInt8(instr, unused_8); // unused mask
01288                                                                 ReadInt8(instr, unused_8); // unused outlier
01289                                                         }
01290                                                 }
01291                                         }
01292                                 }
01293                         }
01294                 }
01295                 else if (m_Header.m_AssayType == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
01296                 {
01297                         int32_t dataSize=0;
01298                         int32_t i32;
01299                         int8_t i8;
01300                         int16_t i16;
01301                         float  score;
01302                         int index;
01303                         std::string str;
01304 
01305                         // Read the base calls.
01306                         m_ReseqResults.Clear();
01307                         ReadInt32_I(instr, dataSize);
01308                         m_ReseqResults.ResizeCalledBases(dataSize);
01309                         m_ReseqResults.ResizeScores(dataSize);
01310                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
01311                         {
01312                                 ReadInt8(instr, i8);
01313                                 m_ReseqResults.SetCalledBase(index, (char)i8);
01314                         }
01315 
01316                         // Ignore the edit section - there were none with the non-XDA file.
01317                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
01318                         {
01319                                 ReadInt8(instr, i8);
01320                         }
01321 
01322                         // Ignore the confidence section - there were none with the non-XDA file.
01323                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
01324                         {
01325                                 ReadInt8(instr, i8);
01326                         }
01327 
01328                         // Ignore the unit index section - there were none with the non-XDA file.
01329                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
01330                         {
01331                                 ReadInt16_I(instr, i16);
01332                         }
01333 
01334                         ReadInt32_I(instr, i32);
01335                         if (i32>0)
01336                         {
01337                                 ReadFixedString(instr, str, i32);
01338                                 ReadInt32_I(instr, i32);
01339                                 if (i32>0)
01340                                         ReadFixedString(instr, str, i32);
01341                         }
01342 
01343                         for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
01344                         {
01345                                 ReadFloat_I(instr, score);
01346                                 m_ReseqResults.SetScore(index, score);
01347                         }
01348                 }
01349                 retVal = true;
01350                 delete[] tagCells;
01351         }
01352 
01353         return retVal;          
01354 }
01355 
01357 
01358 bool CCHPFileData::IsXDACompatibleFile()
01359 {
01360         // Open the file.
01361         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01362         if (!instr)
01363                 return false;
01364 
01365         // Read the magic number from the file.
01366         int32_t magic=0;
01367         ReadInt32_I(instr, magic);
01368         bool bXDAFile = (magic == CHP_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER);
01369         instr.close();
01370 
01371         return bXDAFile;
01372 }
01373 
01375 
01376 bool CCHPFileData::IsMas5File()
01377 {
01378         // Open the file.
01379         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01380         if (!instr) return false;
01381 
01382         // Read the string that defines the CHP file (older format).
01383         char vString[256]="";
01384         char AppName[256]="GeneChip Sequence File";
01385         ReadFixedCString(instr, vString, (int) strlen(AppName));
01386         if (strcmp(vString, AppName))
01387         {
01388                 return false;
01389         }
01390 
01391         // Read the version number
01392         int32_t ival;
01393         ReadInt32_I(instr, ival);
01394         if(ival < 12)
01395         {
01396                 return false;
01397         }
01398         instr.close();
01399 
01400         return true;
01401 }
